attributes.action: dismiss Lady Scotland, on the basis that a lawbreaker is unfit to be a law maker.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reports suggest Lady Scotland may have been economical with the truth. Her former housekeeper denies Lady Scotland saw her passport. One of them must, therefore, be telling less than the truth. The housekeeper has little to lose, unlike Lady Scotland. The situation is not helped by Gordon Brown's rush to pronounce on the verdict.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
